headline.main: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond
headline.print_headline: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond

lead_paragraph: Opel's European works council and labor union IG Metall will make their approval of a deal by General Motors to sell the carmaker to France's PSA Group dependent on details of their plans for Opel's future, they said in joint statement on Monday.
